widget.name: My Sister's Keeper
widget.description:
The My Sisterâ€™s Keeper Mobile App provides a platform for a global community of women and girls of color to receive loving affirmations about the questions young girls of color ask themselves growing up. Not everyone has a positive maternal confidant to help answer their questions and DIVAS helps fill that void with this free mobile app that lets a young girl ask a question about body image, relationships or just know someone loves them.
Young girls in Beford Stuyvesant, Brooklyn, filmed all of the content in this App and helped to edit, design and program the Mobile App.
